hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Install Dependencies sudo zypper update -y sudo zypper install -y wget tar gcc gcc-c++ git patch java-1_8_0-openjdk-devel libzypp-devel libapr1 libapr1-devel subversion subversion-devel cyrus-sasl-devel cyrus-sasl-crammd5 python-devel libclang autoconf automake libtool bzip2
# Set Environment variables export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib64/jvm/java-1.8.0 export PATH=/usr/lib64/jvm/java-1.8.0/bin:$PATH
# Install Maven wget http://www-us.apache.org/dist/maven/maven-3/3.3.9/binaries/apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz tar zxvf apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz export PATH=$PWD/apache-maven-3.3.9/bin:$PATH
# Download source code and apply patches git clone https://github.com/apache/mesos cd mesos/ git checkout 1.3.1
# Build and install Mesos ./bootstrap mkdir build sed -i '134i \ \<maxmemory>512m</maxmemory>' src/java/mesos.pom.in cd build ../configure make sudo make install
# Start Master nohup sudo ./bin/mesos-master.sh --ip=127.0.0.1 --work_dir=/var/lib/mesos &
sleep 50
# Verification wget http://127.0.0.1:5050
